https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r1bfalxdKKMhM8w3r1ngmxelr68.jpg Kid, a 15-year-old hard laborer, steals a map that promises to reveal the location of the notorious pirate Black Mor's treasure. Together with his crew -- MacGregor, Beanpole, Taka and Jim the monkey -- Kid procures a vessel and sets out to sea. Black Mor's Island
